name: Pumpkin Panic (HitchH1k3r)
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 52 "Harvest"

Reading the local newspaper for your pumpkin fixated town, you come across an ad for an old pumpkin patch. It’s been closed for years, but maybe you can buy it and start growing pumpkins again.

Still questions about why it closed in the first place trouble you, Hopefully you don’t find yourself in a Pumpkin Panic, and instead focus on growing gourds, keeping up with the local news, automating your farm, and buying upgrades, but you better harvest your pumpkins, before something harvests you.

Controls
  • Interact - Mouse + Left Mouse Button
Helpful Info
  • Every morning (60 seconds of game time), a newspaper will be delivered. The newspaper offers upgrades that will help you and your farm.
  • You can hold up to 5 newspapers at once (so feel free to let your automated farm do some work while you stretch or go for a walk).
  • The game has an ending, see if you can reach it.
Credits
  • HitchH1k3r
